com.epam.finaltask.dao

Interface Dao<T extends Entity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Entity to work with
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccountDao, MessageDao, TopicDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDao, AccountDaoImpl, MessageDaoImpl, TopicDaoImpl

    public interface Dao<T extends Entity>
    Interface which provides basic DAO methods.
